channel.title: Is this a Good or Bad Thing?
channel.description: Ok. This started a long time ago, I found out who my friend liked, and over myspace i told her that he cut himself, and i tell her something bad everyday. Now, i know that he never liked her and that he used her to covor up who he really liked b/c he knew i would screw it up for him. He had a girlfriend the whole time i told who he said he liked that he cut himself, and after 2 years today, she broke up with him and became emo, but me and my friends take all his sharp objects, today i but himself with a broken cd. His girlfriend he had all along broke up with him b/c she thought he was cheating on him, and he wasn't. And i bug him about it everyday screaming her name in her ear, today he got suspended b/c he punched my in the mouth, and kicked my friend down the stairs b/c we were both screaming her name. Now He tells random people i want to do 'things' to them. When he punched me in the lip, my braces cut open his nuckes. and i would have kicked his for 2 reasons, he is half my size(im 5'9), and he has a arm cast. We are all 6th graders and everybody in this is in 6th grade. Is this bad or good?

item.title: Is this a Good or Bad Thing?
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

Ok, I think I know why he is in grade 6, and such a tall person.

He failed at least 3 times.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a Good or Bad Thing?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I’ve been here since I was late 11. I am now 13.

One way to prove you have braces, as Kamu would say, PICS OR LIES.
I’m going into year 8, and I need braces.

[quote=“the fu superior, post:77, topic:161276”]If it were true it would be ba… no it would be goo… wait, no one really gives a shit.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 01:48:12 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Casey. link=topic=219524.msg1903744#msg1903744 date=1196302984]
So you’re 12 years old.

The age limit here is supposedly 13.

BAN PLS
[/quote]

SHIT! THE LIMIT IS 13? that means alot of ppl are banned[/quote]
Why do you have a made up signiture? I looked at the quote page. And it is far from what mitb said.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
